Sentencas: Orthoferrites perovskites are an important family of materials in the field of nanotechnology, particularly for cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: Doping these materials enables the enhancement and control of their properties.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: In this context, we studied the effect of Ti doping on different properties of the La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3 (x = 0, 0.1, 0.2 and 0.3) lanthanum orthoferrites.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: X-Ray Diffraction (XRD) measurements proved the presence of two orthorhombic phases with Pbnm and Pnma space groups.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: SEM images corroborate the XRD results, clearly signaling the presence of two phases in these samples, with EDS analysis allowing the estimation of each phase fraction.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: FTIR and Raman spectroscopies allowed us to study the vibrational modes related with the La-O, Fe-O and Ti-O bonds.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: We note a shift towards higher wavenumber associated with the increase in Ti.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: Magnetic measurements showed a transition from antiferromagnetism to weak ferromagnetism with the introduction of Ti.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: The zero-field cooled (ZFC) and field cooled (FC) magnetization versus temperature curves do not superimpose, proving the heterogeneity of the magnetic properties of the samples.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3

Sentencas: The saturation magnetization M-s, the remanent magnetization M-r and the coercive field H-c decrease with both increasing temperature and Ti content.
Titulo: Effect of Ti doping on the structural, morphological and magnetic properties of La0.7Ga0.3Fe1-xTixO3
